arts.ttl: Liverpool-Real Madrid reaction: Reds' resurgence continues, Trent's unhappy return to Anfield, more
arts.sum: Liverpool turned in their best performance of the season vs. Real Madrid in the Champions League, as Trent Alexander-Arnold faced his old club for the first time.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 1-0 Real Madrid ANALYSIS: The Reds star who enjoyed his best game in a year, the key tactical tweak used by Arne Slot - and the England hopeful who didn't help his chances of a squad call-up this month
arts.sum: Liverpool put in their performance of the season to extinguish any lingering thoughts of a blip or crisis by beating Real Madrid on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Bellingham and Alonso respond to Alexander-Arnold boos as Liverpool beat Real Madrid
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham does not believe the Liverpool fans’ booing of Trent Alexander-Arnold upon his return to Anfield with Real Madrid is a true reflection of their feelings for him. The right-back was did not have a happy reunion with his former club on Tuesday night as Arne Slot’s men won 1-0 in the UEFA Champions […] The post Bellingham and Alonso respond to Alexander-Arnold boos as Liverpool beat Real Madrid first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham delivers verdict on Liverpool fans as Trent Alexander-Arnold is booed on Anfield return
arts.sum: Alexander-Arnold was subjected to boos from Liverpool supporters on his return to Anfield

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe struggles again at Anfield as Liverpool beats Real Madrid 1-0
arts.sum: For the second year running, the Real Madrid forward had a night to forget on Merseyside as Liverpool won 1-0 in the Champions League, and Mbappe looked a shadow of the player who has been tearing defenses apart all season. Liverpool coach Arne Slot said he had sharpened the focus of his players before the match by reminding them of goal contributions made by Mbappe and Vinicius this season.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Post-Match Press Conference Following Real Madrid’s UCL Loss vs Liverpool
arts.sum: Today was a demanding match, and we have to be careful with those fouls because that's where the game can slip away, as it did. Q: Do you think your team has peaks and troughs in matches?

arts.ttl: Champions League round-up: Bayern Munich beat holders PSG to go top
arts.sum: Luis Diaz scored twice and was sent off in a thrilling game in Paris.

arts.ttl: Mac Allister: Liverpool win over Real Madrid ‘doesn’t mean anything’
arts.sum: Alexis Mac Allister says that Liverpool’s win over Real Madrid in the UEFA Champions League “doesn’t mean anything” after going out in the round of 16 last season. The Argentine midfielder scored the only goal of the game to give the Reds a huge victory over Xabi Alonso’s side at Anfield on Tuesday night. The […] The post Mac Allister: Liverpool win over Real Madrid ‘doesn’t mean anything’ first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot praises 'outstanding' Liverpool star after Real Madrid Champions League win
arts.sum: Conor Bradley was singled out for high praise by Liverpool’s manager, on the night when Trent Alexander-Arnold returned to Anfield

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher accuses Trent Alexander-Arnold of 'hoodwinking' Liverpool fans after staying silent over his future before joining Real Madrid
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher has defended the hostile reception received by Trent Alexander-Arnold on the right back's first return to Anfield since leaving Liverpool in the summer.
